text:
="preserve">Miao Chunting (May 1919 – 17 September 2020) was a Chinese politician. He was born in Shandong Province. He was twice Chairman of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference Committee of Guizhou from 1959 to 1967 and again from 1980 to 1993. He was a member of the Communist Party of China.
Miao died on 17 September 2020 in Guizhou at the age of 101.
